About.motto: To combat unemployment in the community by empowering the youth with valuable IT skills
About.separate: We strive at satisfying our customers by providing them with the most up-to-date training with a state of the art technology that meets their needs.
About.paragraph: The IT Centre PCC is the Information Technology Centre of the Presbyterian Church in Cameroon (PCC).  It was created in 2002 with support from Mission 21 Basel, Switzerland as a Youth Unemployment Programme carried out within the North West and South West Provinces of Cameroon to alleviate youth unemployment. It has as vision combating unemployment in the community by empowering the youth with valuable IT skills.Since its inception, this project has trained well over 5,000 trainees in different areas of Information Technology.In May 2006 the centre gained accreditation as a vocational training centre under the Ministry of Vocational Training (Ministerial decision No. 08/MINEFOP/SG/SACD/11/05/2006). Its main areas of operations now are IT training and providing IT services to the Synod Office. It also serves as a capacity building centre for the Presbyterian Church in Cameroon.IT Centre PCC is an accredited International Computer Driving Licence (ICDL) test centre, and  offers training that leads to the different ICDL diplomas
